Value: Alert\nJuice reserves critically low.\nRadiation exposure imminent - crew survival at risk.

W/A/S/D – Move camera
Right Mouse Button – Move/interact
Left Mouse Button – Click/drag to select
Mouse Scroll – Zoom in/out
TAB – Toggle slow time mode (increases juice consumption)
I / F – Toggle inventory
R - Select all crew members
1–9 – Select specific crew member
Spacebar – Halt movement
E – Focus camera on selected crew member
Q – Cycle through selected crew member's skills
